text: Niscaya yisakale imana aniche arau yisakale iyahudi haiche lagate nacharaa arau chabeyisakalara yihamte'i allaha arau sesa dirasara prati imana ane arau satkama karae, sihamtara babe sihamtara pratipalakara ocarata puraskara ache; arau sihamtara kono bhaya na'i arau sihamta cintita'o nahaâ€™ba
